solution_line_template: The supplier brought {required_feet} ft - {free_feet} ft = <<{required_feet}-{free_feet}={remaining_feet}>>{remaining_feet} fewer feet of metal roofing.

Therefore the total amount of money Mr. Caiden has to pay for the remaining metal roofings is {remaining_feet} feet * ${cost_per_foot}/foot = $<<{remaining_feet}*{cost_per_foot}={total_cost}>>{total_cost}
